title: "This can be a very mean spirited town": Tillerson bids farewell
text:
"This can be a very mean spirited town": Tillerson bids farewell Friday, March 23, 2018 - 02:12 
U.S. Secretary of State Rex Tillerson bid farewell to his staff at the State Department on Thursday and urged them to 'never lose sight' of their personal integrity. Rough cut (no reporter narration).   
U.S. Secretary of State Rex Tillerson bid farewell to his staff at the State Department on Thursday and urged them to 'never lose sight' of their personal integrity. Rough cut (no reporter narration).  //reut.rs/2Gijpte
